item.description:
When we get still in our mind, we can draw close to the Great Source of
peace and love. Getting still in our mind is essential to meditation.

So how does one come to this place in meditation of spiritual silence and
stillness when our minds are filled with chaos and chatter?

This workshop emphasizes the importance of learning to listen, without
distraction, to that Still Small Voice Within through the practice of
meditation. And in this seminar, you will learn how to quiet your mind and
tap into a natural state of REST, PEACE, JOY and CREATIVITY that is
possible for everyone.
